name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 14, Yulin taxi drivers went on strike and put forward five demands, including requiring online ride-hailing vehicles to operate in compliance with regulations, raising fares, rectifying illegal gas station practices, chaotic passenger solicitation by buses, and lowering gas prices.
At the same time, because the local transport management was checking online ride-hailing vehicles, online ride-hailing vehicles were afraid to go on the road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Telling Chinese stories well
On June 12, Twitch anchor Justketh @Justketh1 was questioned by several police officers while live streaming in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, and the live streaming was forced to be interrupted.
In the video, she was introducing the Huabiao to the live viewers, but then a police officer came up to communicate with her using translation software and asked her to turn off the live streaming.
Afterwards, Justketh said that a police officer yelled at her and took a photo of her passport for archiving.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Justketh1

content: A bookstore in Tianjin

content: A bookstore in Hong Kong

content: A library in Hangzhou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the eve of the Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee, the website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission reported on the 16th that Wu Yingjie, member of the Standing Committee of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and director of the Cultural, Historical and Learning Committee, was suspected of serious violations of discipline and law and is currently under disciplinary review and supervision investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission. It is understood that this is another former provincial party secretary who has fallen from power after Sun Zhigang, the former secretary of the Guizhou Provincial Party Committee last year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that CATL announced that employees above JG7+ will be forced to implement the 896 work system for 100 days starting from June 12, while foreign employees are not required to do so.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"After 12 years of farming, I have a deep understanding of the meaning of the word farmer"
On June 16, a 7-minute video told the bitterness and difficulties of farmers. A woman in Dalian, Liaoning Province posted a video saying that in 1999, her parents sold their property and contracted a barren mountain. Since then, the family has moved into the mountain and made a living by raising sheep. After graduating from university in 2012, she and her husband planted cherries on the mountain. She originally thought that she could live a peaceful life from then on.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added: Hunchun Rural Commercial Bank has already stopped international foreign exchange settlement business ahead of schedule on May 9, and is ready to face international sanctions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 16, Shanghai's famous lesbian bar ROXIE announced that it would close due to force majeure.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 16, Shenyang, Liaoning. A man and an uncle got into an argument over a seat on Metro Line 1. The man suddenly broke down and shouted, "I have to make money, and everyone is bullying me."
Netizens commented, "To be honest, young people now need to sit down and rest more than older people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/vNaRlEbKHx

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China's "Regulations on Administrative Law Enforcement Procedures of Coast Guard Agencies" officially came into effect on June 15. According to the new regulations, foreign ships and foreigners who illegally enter China's territorial waters and the South China Sea may also be detained for investigation for up to 60 days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 15, Hong Kong Financial Secretary Paul Chan responded to the statement that "Hong Kong's status as an international financial center will be replaced by other regions or cities in Asia."
Paul Chan said: "These arguments may be spread without grasping the facts. The country's support for Hong Kong is unparalleled in Asia."
This statement triggered ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 16, a farmer in Chizhou, Anhui, said in his WeChat Moments that he was interrogated for four hours by local police because he wrote an open letter to Ukrainian President Zelensky to express his respect for the Ukrainian people's fearless resistance and donated 1,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 16, a netizen who joined the pink team to welcome Li Qiang in Adelaide, Australia shared his experience of the day

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
Emergency roses on Urumqi Zhonglu Road

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, the Civil Affairs Bureau released the civil affairs statistics for the first quarter of 2024. The number of marriage registrations nationwide in the first quarter was 1.969 million, a decrease of 178,000 pairs year-on-year, and the full-year data may continue to decline.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 15, a traffic accident occurred on Sada Road in Honggang District, Daqing City, Heilongjiang Province. A car collided with a truck, killing five people. It was reported online that four of them were college entrance examination candidates who had attended a college entrance examination banquet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 16, South Street, Xingfu Twelve Village, Yantai, Shandong. A woman posted a video saying that her legal and licensed house was demolished by the government, and the police refused to file a case. On that day, the demolition personnel forcibly dragged the family out and demolished the house into ruins. During the period, the two sides had a physical conflict, and the woman shouted "You are all gangsters!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 15, the Financial Times quoted an insider as saying that Xi Jinping told visiting European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen in April 2023: "The United States is trying to trick China into invading Taiwan, but he will not take the bait."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I hope all patriotic netizens will keep their eyes open and be wary of certain official media and celebrities who constantly clamor for the military reunification of Taiwan. These people may be American spies.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 16, Changchun, Jilin. Changchun Wanrong Decoration Materials Company owed workers wages, and the workers sat in front of the company under the scorching sun to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 16, Linyi, Shandong. The Tofu Taikang City real estate project was left unfinished, and the owners shouted on the rooftop: "We can't survive. Each of us has a loan of hundreds of thousands of yuan. We have lost our house and our money."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is rumored online that the rent increase subsidies will be withheld within the Suzhou system in Anhui.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 16, a middle school student-made publication in Zhengzhou, "Heart Youth", announced an indefinite suspension due to suppression by the school. The suspension announcement stated that the original intention of "Heart Youth" was to build a platform for teachers and students to speak out, but now the school and school leaders no longer communicate with students, and no one cares about the demands of a group of "exam machines". At the same time, the school also arrested students who helped trigger the newspaper. Therefore, in order to avoid continuing the activities and causing more students to be arrested, it had to announce the suspension.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School is a famous "old revolutionary base", and students of the school have launched actions to defend campus democracy many times in the past.

content: At present, Jiaoling County, Meizhou City, Guangdong Province is experiencing floods, and the county reservoir is preparing to release floodwaters tonight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up of the incident
Mr. Ni, the head of the office of the Experimental School affiliated to the Zhejiang Provincial Institute of Educational Sciences, said that the person who posted the video was Han, a sixth-grade student of the school. After the school found the relevant video he posted, it immediately conducted an investigation and communication. Han and his parents were satisfied with this.
